content: Should a PR appear on #queue4 the moment it satisfies the requirements? If so then I'm a bit confused about why !4#3884 isn't on there. One of the CI jobs ("Detect changes to header SHAs") failed for some reason, but I re-ran it and it worked. I'm a bit puzzled.
Thanks! Indeed it's magically there now. In return I reviewed !4#3873 :-)
